attributes.action: FORCE THE BRITISH OLYMPIC COMMITTEE TO SCRAP THE LONDON 2012 LOGO
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THE OLYMPIC COMMITTEE'S 2012 LONDON LOGO IS AN ABSOLUTE EMBARASSMENT. IT SHOULD BE SCRAPPED AND REPLACED WITH ARTWORK THAT IS TRULY REPRESENTATIVE OF LONDON AND BRITAIN AS A WHOLE.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
